<div style="height: 20px;"></div>

Renju (連珠) is a type of <i>gomoku</i> (五目) played on a go board.

![](renju_figs/screenshot-20250624173220.gif){width=50% fig-align="left"}

For precise rules, please refer to the [Wikipedia page](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Renju).
Renju is a finite-state, 2-player, zero-sum game of perfect information, and it is known that without any additional rules, Black (the first player) always wins. 

Visit my [Renju practice room](renju_hard.qmd)!
